alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 8:46PM PST until February 28 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 2000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, except up to 8 inches above 2500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning above 1500 feet, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches with locally 2 feet expected in the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph in the valleys with gusts to 50 mph in the higher terrain. * WHERE...For the Winter Weather Advisory, the lower I-5 passes north of Grants Pass and the Kalmiopsis Wilderness. For the Winter Storm Warning, the I-5 passes north of Grants Pass, including the Kalmiopsis Wilderness, Bear Camp Road, and highway 199 from Hayes Hill Summit southward. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 AM to 4 PM PST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 10 PM Sunday to 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There could be a brief burst of snow around sunrise Sunday that lowers the snow level down to 1500 feet. Minor snow accumulations of an inch or so could occur at Hayes Hill Summit. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is likely and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
